verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> be unto the pastors<WH7462> that destroy<WH6> and scatter<WH6327> <WH853> the sheep<WH6629> of my pasture!<WH4830> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> against<WH5921> the pastors<WH7462> that feed<WH7462> <WH853> my people;<WH5971> Ye<WH859> have scattered<WH6327> <WH853> my flock,<WH6629> and driven them away,<WH5080> and have not<WH3808> visited<WH6485> them: behold,<WH2009> I will visit<WH6485> upon<WH5921> you<WH853> the evil<WH7455> of your doings,<WH4611> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

And I<WH589> will gather<WH6908> <WH853> the remnant<WH7611> of my flock<WH6629> out of all<WH4480> <WH3605> countries<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> I have driven<WH5080> them, and will bring them again<WH7725> <WH853> to<WH5921> their folds;<WH5116> and they shall be fruitful<WH6509> and increase.<WH7235>

And I will set up<WH6965> shepherds<WH7462> over<WH5921> them which shall feed<WH7462> them: and they shall fear<WH3372> no<WH3808> more,<WH5750> nor<WH3808> be dismayed,<WH2865> neither<WH3808> shall they be lacking,<WH6485> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

Behold, <WH2009> the days<WH3117> come,<WH935> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that I will raise<WH6965> unto David<WH1732> a righteous<WH6662> Branch,<WH6780> and a King<WH4428> shall reign<WH4427> and prosper,<WH7919> and shall execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and justice<WH6666> in the earth.<WH776>

In his days<WH3117> Judah<WH3063> shall be saved,<WH3467> and Israel<WH3478> shall dwell<WH7931> safely:<WH983> and this<WH2088> is his name<WH8034> whereby<WH834> he shall be called,<WH7121> THE LORD<WH3068> OUR RIGHTEOUSNESS.<WH6664>

Therefore, <WH3651> behold,<WH2009> the days<WH3117> come,<WH935> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that they shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> say,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> liveth,<WH2416> which<WH834> brought up<WH5927> <WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714>

But, <WH3588> <WH518> The LORD<WH3068> liveth,<WH2416> which<WH834> brought up<WH5927> and which<WH834> led<WH935> <WH853> the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> out of the north<WH6828> country,<WH4480> <WH776> and from all<WH4480> <WH3605> countries<WH776> whither<WH834> <WH8033> I had driven<WH5080> them; and they shall dwell<WH3427> in<WH5921> their own land.<WH127>

Mine heart<WH3820> within<WH7130> me is broken<WH7665> because of the prophets;<WH5030> all<WH3605> my bones<WH6106> shake;<WH7363> I am<WH1961> like a drunken<WH7910> man,<WH376> and like a man<WH1397> whom wine<WH3196> hath overcome,<WH5674> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the LORD,<WH3068> and because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the words<WH1697> of his holiness.<WH6944>

For <WH3588> the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of adulterers;<WH5003> for<WH3588> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of swearing<WH423> the land<WH776> mourneth;<WH56> the pleasant places<WH4999> of the wilderness<WH4057> are dried up,<WH3001> and their course<WH4794> is<WH1961> evil,<WH7451> and their force<WH1369> is not<WH3808> right.<WH3651>

For <WH3588> both<WH1571> prophet<WH5030> and<WH1571> priest<WH3548> are profane;<WH2610> yea,<WH1571> in my house<WH1004> have I found<WH4672> their wickedness,<WH7451> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

Wherefore <WH3651> their way<WH1870> shall be<WH1961> unto them as slippery<WH2519> ways in the darkness:<WH653> they shall be driven on,<WH1760> and fall<WH5307> therein: for<WH3588> I will bring<WH935> evil<WH7451> upon<WH5921> them, even the year<WH8141> of their visitation,<WH6486> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
And I have seen<WH7200> folly<WH8604> in the prophets<WH5030> of Samaria;<WH8111> they prophesied<WH5012> in Baal,<WH1168> and caused<WH853> my people<WH5971> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> to err.<WH8582>

I have seen<WH7200> also in the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> a horrible thing:<WH8186> they commit adultery,<WH5003> and walk<WH1980> in lies:<WH8267> they strengthen<WH2388> also the hands<WH3027> of evildoers,<WH7489> that none<WH1115> <WH376> doth return<WH7725> from his wickedness:<WH4480> <WH7451> they are<WH1961> all<WH3605> of them unto me as Sodom,<WH5467> and the inhabitants<WH3427> thereof as Gomorrah.<WH6017>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> concerning<WH5921> the prophets;<WH5030> Behold,<WH2009> I will feed<WH398> them with wormwood,<WH3939> and make them drink<WH8248> the water<WH4325> of gall:<WH7219> for<WH3588> from<WH4480> <WH854> the prophets<WH5030> of Jerusalem<WH3389> is profaneness<WH2613> gone forth<WH3318> into all<WH3605> the land.<WH776>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> Hearken<WH8085> not<WH408> unto<WH5921> the words<WH1697> of the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> unto you: they make you vain:<WH1891> <WH853> they<WH1992> speak<WH1696> a vision<WH2377> of their own heart,<WH3820> and not<WH3808> out of the mouth<WH4480> <WH6310> of the LORD.<WH3068>

They say still<WH559> <WH559> unto them that despise<WH5006> me, The LORD<WH3068> hath said,<WH1696> Ye shall have<WH1961> peace;<WH7965> and they say<WH559> unto every one<WH3605> that walketh<WH1980> after the imagination<WH8307> of his own heart,<WH3820> No<WH3808> evil<WH7451> shall come<WH935> upon<WH5921> you.

For <WH3588> who<WH4310> hath stood<WH5975> in the counsel<WH5475> of the LORD,<WH3068> and hath perceived<WH7200> and heard<WH8085> <WH853> his word?<WH1697> who<WH4310> hath marked<WH7181> his word,<WH1697> and heard<WH8085> it?

Behold, <WH2009> a whirlwind<WH5591> of the LORD<WH3068> is gone forth<WH3318> in fury,<WH2534> even a grievous<WH2342> whirlwind:<WH5591> it shall fall grievously<WH2342> upon<WH5921> the head<WH7218> of the wicked.<WH7563>

The anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> shall not<WH3808> return,<WH7725> until<WH5704> he have executed,<WH6213> and till<WH5704> he have performed<WH6965> the thoughts<WH4209> of his heart:<WH3820> in the latter<WH319> days<WH3117> ye shall consider<WH995> it perfectly.<WH998>
I have not<WH3808> sent<WH7971> <WH853> these prophets,<WH5030> yet they<WH1992> ran:<WH7323> I have not<WH3808> spoken<WH1696> to<WH413> them, yet they<WH1992> prophesied.<WH5012>

But if<WH518> they had stood<WH5975> in my counsel,<WH5475> and had caused<WH853> my people<WH5971> to hear<WH8085> my words,<WH1697> then they should have turned<WH7725> them from their evil<WH7451> way,<WH4480> <WH1870> and from the evil<WH4480> <WH7455> of their doings.<WH4611>
Am I<WH589> a God<WH430> at hand,<WH4480> <WH7138> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> and not<WH3808> a God<WH430> afar off?<WH4480> <WH7350>

Can <WH518> any<WH376> hide himself<WH5641> in secret places<WH4565> that I<WH589> shall not<WH3808> see<WH7200> him? saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068> Do not<WH3808> I<WH589> fill<WH4390> <WH853> heaven<WH8064> and earth?<WH776> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
I have heard<WH8085> <WH853> what<WH834> the prophets<WH5030> said,<WH559> that prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267> in my name,<WH8034> saying,<WH559> I have dreamed,<WH2492> I have dreamed.<WH2492>

How long<WH5704> <WH4970> shall this be<WH3426> in the heart<WH3820> of the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> lies?<WH8267> yea, they are prophets<WH5030> of the deceit<WH8649> of their own heart;<WH3820>

Which think<WH2803> to cause<WH853> my people<WH5971> to forget<WH7911> my name<WH8034> by their dreams<WH2472> which<WH834> they tell<WH5608> every man<WH376> to his neighbor,<WH7453> as<WH834> their fathers<WH1> have forgotten<WH7911> <WH853> my name<WH8034> for Baal.<WH1168>

The prophet<WH5030> that<WH834> <WH854> hath a dream,<WH2472> let him tell<WH5608> a dream;<WH2472> and he that<WH834> <WH854> hath my word,<WH1697> let him speak<WH1696> my word<WH1697> faithfully.<WH571> What<WH4100> is the chaff<WH8401> to<WH854> the wheat?<WH1250> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
Is not<WH3808> my word<WH1697> like<WH3541> as a fire?<WH784> saith<WH5002> the LORD;<WH3068> and like a hammer<WH6360> that breaketh<WH6327> the rock<WH5553> in pieces?

Therefore, <WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH5921> the prophets,<WH5030> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that steal<WH1589> my words<WH1697> every one<WH376> from<WH4480> <WH854> his neighbor.<WH7453>
Behold, <WH2009> I am against<WH5921> the prophets,<WH5030> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that use<WH3947> their tongues,<WH3956> and say,<WH5001> He saith.<WH5002>

Behold, <WH2009> I am against<WH5921> them that prophesy<WH5012> false<WH8267> dreams,<WH2472> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> and do tell<WH5608> them, and cause<WH853> my people<WH5971> to err<WH8582> by their lies,<WH8267> and by their lightness;<WH6350> yet I<WH595> sent<WH7971> them not,<WH3808> nor<WH3808> commanded<WH6680> them: therefore they shall not<WH3808> profit this people at all,<WH3276> <WH3276> <WH5971> <WH2088> saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

And when<WH3588> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> or<WH176> the prophet,<WH5030> or<WH176> a priest,<WH3548> shall ask<WH7592> thee, saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> is the burden<WH4853> of the LORD?<WH3068> thou shalt then say<WH559> unto<WH413> them,<WH853> What<WH4100> burden?<WH4853> I will even forsake<WH5203> you, saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>

And as for the prophet,<WH5030> and the priest,<WH3548> and the people,<WH5971> that<WH834> shall say,<WH559> The burden<WH4853> of the LORD,<WH3068> I will even punish<WH6485> <WH5921> that<WH1931> man<WH376> and his house.<WH1004>

Thus <WH3541> shall ye say<WH559> every one<WH376> to<WH5921> his neighbor,<WH7453> and every one<WH376> to<WH413> his brother,<WH251> What<WH4100> hath the LORD<WH3068> answered?<WH6030> and, What<WH4100> hath the LORD<WH3068> spoken?<WH1696>

And the burden<WH4853> of the LORD<WH3068> shall ye mention<WH2142> no<WH3808> more:<WH5750> for<WH3588> every man's<WH376> word<WH1697> shall be<WH1961> his burden;<WH4853> for ye have perverted<WH2015> <WH853> the words<WH1697> of the living<WH2416> God,<WH430> of the LORD<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> our God.<WH430>
Thus <WH3541> shalt thou say<WH559> to<WH413> the prophet,<WH5030> What<WH4100> hath the LORD<WH3068> answered<WH6030> thee? and, What<WH4100> hath the LORD<WH3068> spoken?<WH1696>

But since<WH518> ye say,<WH559> The burden<WH4853> of the LORD;<WH3068> therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD;<WH3068> Because<WH3282> ye say<WH559> <WH853> this<WH2088> word,<WH1697> The burden<WH4853> of the LORD,<WH3068> and I have sent<WH7971> unto<WH413> you, saying,<WH559> Ye shall not<WH3808> say,<WH559> The burden<WH4853> of the LORD;<WH3068>

Therefore, <WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I, even I, will utterly forget<WH5382> <WH5382> you, and I will forsake<WH5203> you, and the city<WH5892> that<WH834> I gave<WH5414> you and your fathers,<WH1> and cast you out of<WH4480> <WH5921> my presence: <WH6440>
And I will bring<WH5414> an everlasting<WH5769> reproach<WH2781> upon<WH5921> you, and a perpetual<WH5769> shame,<WH3640> which<WH834> shall not<WH3808> be forgotten.<WH7911>
